proposed approach.from sentence:
reports the experimental results on SemEvalCQA .
Our proposed approach achieves highly competitive performance on this dataset .

our model.from sentence: The performance of our model on MAP is marginally short from the best performing model .

best P@1 performance over all.from sentence: Specifically , we have obtained the best P@1 performance over all , outperforming the state - of - the - art AI - CNN model by 3 % in terms of P@1 .

achieves.from sentence:
reports the results on TrecQA ( raw ) .
Hyper QA achieves very competitive performance on both MAP and MRR metrics .

basic CNN model of ( S&M ).from sentence: Specifically , Hyper QA outperforms the basic CNN model of ( S&M ) by 2 % ? 3 % in terms of MAP / MRR .

outperforms.from sentence:
Similarly , reports the results on TrecQA ( clean ) .
Similarly , Hyper QA also outperforms MP - CNN , AP - CNN and QA - CNN .
